1298870.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Token Pack 02 - Desert Creatures
1298870.description:
Jans Token Pack 02 - Desert Creatures

Creatures for your desert campaigns!
Mummy's, Liches, Half-Scorpions, Mantismen, Sand Golems, Jackal people from ancient Egypt, Cactusmen and a huge undead sand-octopus!
This product includes:
  • Abomination of Anubis
  • Ant Lion
  • Cactus Sentinal
  • Clawed Mummy
  • Desert Hunter
  • Desert Lich
  • Desert Zombie
  • Dire Vulture
  • Djinni
  • Efreet
  • Giant Dragonfly
  • Mantis Man
  • Monstrous Scorpion
  • Mummy
  • Sand Golem
  • Sand Octopus
  • Scorpion Folk
  • Warrior of Anubis
  • Wizard of Anubis
Converted by:  
Jan Loos
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
